steps.observation: Mikhail Sergeyevich Gorbachev, ( ; Russian: Михаи́л Серге́евич Горбачёв ; ] ; born 2 March 1931) is a former Soviet statesman.  He was the eighth and last leader of the Soviet Union, having been General Secretary of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union from 1985 until 1991.  He was the country's head of state from 1988 until 1991 (titled as Chairman of the Presidium of the Supreme Soviet from 1988 to 1989, as Chairman of the from 1989 to 1990, and as Soviet Union]] from 1990 to 1991).

steps.observation: Anastas Ivanovich Mikoyan ; 25 November 1895 – 21 October 1978) was an Old Bolshevik and Soviet statesman during the mandates of Lenin, Stalin, Khrushchev, and Brezhnev.  He was the only Soviet politician who managed to remain at the highest levels of power within the Communist Party of the Soviet Union, as that power oscillated between the Central Committee and the Politburo, from the latter days of Lenin's rule, throughout the eras of Stalin and Khrushchev, until his peaceful retirement after the first months of Brezhnev's rule.

steps.thought: The information about Anastas Mikoyan is also not directly related to the question about initiating a forum. However, I'll continue searching to find a connection. I'll try another name from the initial list.

action_input.title: World Summit of Nobel Peace Laureates

steps.observation: The World Summit of Nobel Peace Laureates was initiated by Mikhail Gorbachev in the 90s, as a forum in which the Nobel Peace Laureates and the Peace Laureate Organizations could come together to address global issues with a view to encourage and support peace and human well being in the world.  Its Permanent Secretariat is an independent, non-profit, ECOSOC non-governmental organization, based in Rome, operating on a permanent basis.  A permanent staff, mainly composed of volunteers, promotes the work of the Nobel Peace Prize Winners and organizes the World Summit of Nobel Peace Laureates on a yearly basis.  To date, the Permanent Secretariat has organized 16 Summits, the most recent having been held in February 2017 in the city of Bogota, Colombia.  This was the first time that the Summit took place in Latin America.

steps.thought: Now I have enough information to answer the question. The World Summit of Nobel Peace Laureates is a forum initiated by Mikhail Gorbachev in the 1990s, where Nobel Peace Laureates come together to address global issues.

action_input.answer: The World Summit of Nobel Peace Laureates, a forum initiated by Mikhail Gorbachev in the 1990s.

steps.observation: Task completed. Final answer: The World Summit of Nobel Peace Laureates, a forum initiated by Mikhail Gorbachev in the 1990s.

runs.final_answer: The World Summit of Nobel Peace Laureates, a forum initiated by Mikhail Gorbachev in the 1990s.

steps.observation: Mikhail Sergeyevich Gorbachev, ( ; Russian: Михаи́л Серге́евич Горбачёв ; ] ; born 2 March 1931) is a former Soviet statesman.  He was the eighth and last leader of the Soviet Union, having been General Secretary of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union from 1985 until 1991.  He was the country's head of state from 1988 until 1991 (titled as Chairman of the Presidium of the Supreme Soviet from 1988 to 1989, as Chairman of the from 1989 to 1990, and as Soviet Union]] from 1990 to 1991).

action_input.title: World Summit of Nobel Peace Laureates

steps.observation: The World Summit of Nobel Peace Laureates was initiated by Mikhail Gorbachev in the 90s, as a forum in which the Nobel Peace Laureates and the Peace Laureate Organizations could come together to address global issues with a view to encourage and support peace and human well being in the world.  Its Permanent Secretariat is an independent, non-profit, ECOSOC non-governmental organization, based in Rome, operating on a permanent basis.  A permanent staff, mainly composed of volunteers, promotes the work of the Nobel Peace Prize Winners and organizes the World Summit of Nobel Peace Laureates on a yearly basis.  To date, the Permanent Secretariat has organized 16 Summits, the most recent having been held in February 2017 in the city of Bogota, Colombia.  This was the first time that the Summit took place in Latin America.

steps.thought: Now I have enough information to answer the question. Mikhail Gorbachev initiated the World Summit of Nobel Peace Laureates, which is a forum where Nobel Peace Laureates and organizations come together to address global issues and promote peace and human well-being.

action_input.answer: The World Summit of Nobel Peace Laureates
